title: Down 160 lbs and can’t find a bra!
text: I had gastric bypass on March 24, 2025. My starting weight was 367 and I am down to 207. I went from a size 28 to a 12 in pants and a 3xl to large in shirts. I am happy with where I’m at right now, but I cannot find a bra! My breasts have lost all the volume but there’s so much excess skin left. What are people doing for bras?
